title: Gifts from A Course in Miracles - Audiobook (hifi)
description:
Gifts from A Course in Miracles
Contains Accept This Gift, A Gift of Healing, and A Gift of Peace
Audio CD â€“ Abridged, Audiobook, CD


A collection of favorite passages read by Richard Thomas.

â€œWithin the Great Book category, there are The Books, the great spiritual resource materials that contain the words that reveal the highest truths. They are The Bible, The Koran, The Talmud, I Ching, and others. For many of us, A Course in Miracles is one of these. It opens the heart to healing and hope and enlightenment and love.â€
â€• Marianne Williamson, bestselling author or A Return to Love

â€œAccept This Gift is a compilation of some of the Course's greatest gems, its most precious moments. It is for me a book to read in quite solitude, when I most need help, and a sense that I am loved.â€
â€• Marianne Williamson on Accept This Gift

â€œA Gift of Peace is what I call a quite book, a serious friend. I read books like this in the middle of the night, or on hilltops, or at the beach. I carry it around with me, as a reminder and a teacher.â€
â€• Marianne Williamson on A Gift of Peace

Richard Thomas is one of America's most highly gifted, versatile, and respected actors. A veteran of over forty years in entertainment, he is renowned for his Emmy Award-winning portrayal of John-boy on The Waltons and has appeared in dozens of television movies, feature films, and theatrical productions.
